def contact(handle):
    for social in ['github', 'twitter', '@protonmail']:
        handle = '_' if 'twitter' in social else '' + handle
        prefix = handle + social if 'mail' in social else social
        suffix = '/' + handle if 'mail' not in social else ''
        print("{0}.com{1}".format(prefix, suffix))
    return Keybase(handle).get_public_key().key_fingerprint

>>> contact("cmry")
u'590edc87174165fb38c8e119b59f24dc34bba046'
